name: Upside Down V2
overview: Upside Down is a classic puzzle game, where the player must arrange a picture on 5x5 board before the time runs out. The game starts from showing a picture. After mixing puzzles the player has designated time to rearrange them back. The indicated puzzle can be moved only on the black spot. Upside Down V2 is a licensed updated version of the original game from L.K. Avalon. with some considerable improvements over the original game, as well as different puzzles and a new intro.
